title: It Is School Time
subtle: Factual Description (nonfiction), 51 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 60L
description: Is it time for reading or time for lunch? Readers may recognize similarities between the events in their own school day and those in It Is School Time. Predictable sentence patterns and supportive pictures guide students as they read.
meta: breakfast, reading, recess, school, science, time
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Capitalization : Recognize and understand that sentences begin with a capital letter
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and pronounce high-frequency words for, is, it, and the

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
